t: Amazon.com: Pablo Casals: CDs & Vinyl
s: The pipe smoking cello genius that was Pablo Casals lends his bow to these lovely works by the likes of Beethoven Haydn etc. This is a nice set of recitals that makes for a a fine CD. As introduction to this genius of the cello a reasonably priced introduction.

t: Pablo Casals - The Sound Of Pablo Casals - Amazon.com Music
s: This extensive collection, The Sound of Pablo Casals, brings together his classic interpretations of the Elgar and Dvorák cello concertos, combined with a variety of suites, piano trios, national Catalonian dances and other showpieces.
